sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey friend

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Anything new in life?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi there.. How have you been?  What's new?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, I have some news!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I just started a new cookery course

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Should take around 2 weeks

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Oh great, I'm sure you will learn some great new cooking methods!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Maybe you can cook me dinner?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Haha! I could

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: If you love to cook, I love to eat.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Cooking and eating love it all

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Right on.  Guess what?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Im an okay cook right now, but the goal is to be a great one

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I just started a new intership at this awesome business.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What’s that?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh wow!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It should take about six months.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds like a great opportunity

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: After I'm done, I'll be hired as a regular employee.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Interning can be a great way to get your foot in the door

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How much do your cooking classes cost?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: A few hundred dollars. Not too crazy

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Maybe I'll join you for the lessons.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That would be great

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi again.  Glad to see you so soon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi friend again

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Has your day gone well?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I always have news of my day.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Can't wait to mention them all to you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What has happened?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I had lunch at a cafe.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That sounds like a nice time

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'll take you there sometime.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I’ve assembled some furniture

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: And also rested a little in the pool

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I had a very long talk with my business clients.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Was it a good talk?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Furniture?  Wow!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: yes, we discussed a lot of things.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow, I also had time to paint an entire room!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It was my bedroom.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It wasn’t too bad to put together. Came from IKEA

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I painted it yellow.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yellow is always a lovely color

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, Ikea furniture always has the easiest instructions ;)

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi friend!  Long time no see!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Where do I begin?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Friend! How have you been?!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Great, so much has happened.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Tell me everything!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Same for me

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: For one, I graduated from my university!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I moved to a new city for work

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What! Congratulations

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow, you are so brave to move to a new city!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It’s been crazy hectic

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: So hectic, yes.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I also adopted a child

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I also adopted a child of all things as well!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What! No way

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: We should get together with our adoptees and have a play date!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Adoption has changed my life

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I love taking care of her

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How old is your kid?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: 5 years old. How about yours?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: My daughter is 5 years old also!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It’s crazy it’s been a year already. It’s flown by

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hello, how are you doing today?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi, I'm doing great how are you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm good! I just started rehearsing a play with my friends from school.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm brainstorming, I got an idea for a new business plan at work.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Cool! What is your idea?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds challenging the play are you excited as I am?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm actually pretty nervous about the play. What if I forget my lines?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I am working on relieving stress in the day.  Have you been acting alot?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text:
That sounds like a very good thing to be working on. 
This is my first play! And since our performance is only three weeks away, I'd better get going to practice my lines some more.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow, how has a year already passed? How did your project on relieving stress turn out?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It was great I management is reviewing its one year progress next week.  How was the play?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: The play was such a success that I decided to do another one! But this one required me to gain weight, which my husband wasn't happy about, so he asked me for a divorce.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm kind of nervous because employees love the way the plan rolled out , but management is going to be evaluating the financial gains.  Thats tough but it is difficult when our bodies transforms.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: If your coworkers love it, I bet it will show on the financial side. So what are you going to do after management makes their decision?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Its true we marry more than our looks and they change maybe just remind him that after the play you can always get your body back.  I'm thinking of taking a break from new projects and try and spread the word to other companies like a consultant.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thanks for the advice! I've decided that I will try my hand at the directing side because I didn't feel good about what I was doing to myself.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I bet with the success of your project from last year you will be a great asset for other companies.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: But now I need to go find out if there are any directing opportunities nearby. Talk to you later!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey, how have you been? It's been almost a year again!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh I forgot to mention we had a  baby this year and thats has given me a totally different perspective.  I am so excited to hear about how you are.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Me too! I took your advice and talked to my husband about how my weight gain was temporary. He realized he wasn't being fair to me and apologized. Now we have a baby!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I got a new car because the job was such a success, So cool that you had a baby

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What kind of car? Yes, our baby is awesome. But now we don't have enough space in our apartment, so we're moving to a new one. The baby is super clingy, so it's going to take at least five days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Isnt it strange how people get upset if you gain weight but when you gain weight to have a baby they want you to gain more.  This new car has me paranoid, its electric and I keep thinking i will electrocute myself

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm sure your car has been safety tested more than we can imagine!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: So what are your plans for the next little while? I'd like to learn how to be more organized this month. It's a definite must with a new baby around.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Clingy baby is what you want when they get teenage years enjoy it while they still want to recognize you. I am just moved its sttressful good luck.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thanks! Good luck to you too with your new baby and your consulting. It was nice to talk to you again!

sessions.text: What you think about the Identify the platforms that the target audience uses most?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Which platform is the most effective for engaging your target audience?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: YouTube is an ideal platform for brands looking to reach and engage with their audience—both in-platform and in Google search.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is a social media platform target audience?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: A targeted audience on social media is a group of people defined by specified behaviors and demographics. Brands offer content curated to their audience's needs, and in turn, individuals feel more connected to the brand. You should understand your brand well enough to know who your target audience is.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is the most popular social platform?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Instagram. Instagram has well surpassed 1 billion monthly users, which is no surprise considering how the app blends the personal and professional with each new feature. If you're wondering whether a meaningful segment of your audience spends time on the platform, the answer is most likely a resounding yes.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What are examples of platforms?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn. Knowledge platforms like StackOverflow, Quora, and Yahoo! Answers. Media sharing platforms like YouTube, Spotify, and Vimeo. Service-oriented platforms like Uber, Airbnb, and GrubHub.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What are the most popular social media platforms 2022 in USA?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: When it comes to the most well-known social networks in the United States, YouTube and Facebook are leading the pack with a brand awareness of 94% each, among internet users. Third is Instagram, with 90% of U.S. respondents knowing them, closely followed by TikTok, Twitter, and Snapchat.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Which social media platforms are growing the most?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Among leading social platforms, the networks with the highest growth rates between 2020 and 2022 were TikTok/Douyin, Instagram, Snapchat, Pinterest and Twitter.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is the latest and greatest social media platform?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: TikTok. Summary: While TikTok is by no means “new” in 2023, its explosive growth over the last few years has made it one of the top-four largest social media companies on the planet. In fact, according to Cloudflare, TikTok was the most popular website in 2021 (outpacing both Google and Facebook).

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What are the six social media platform?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: The top five most popular social media platforms in the world are Facebook, YouTube, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook Messenger. TikTok comes right after that, but Snapchat is number 11, Twitter is number 15, and LinkedIn isn't even on there.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Could you define KPIs for measurement.?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: KPI stands for key performance indicator, a quantifiable measure of performance over time for a specific objective.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is KPI for measurements?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: KPIs are quantifiable measurements or data points used to gauge your company's performance relative to a goal. For instance, a KPI could be related to your goal of increasing sales, improving the return on investment of your marketing efforts, or improving customer service

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds good

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you please ask more question about this events.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Well, What are the 5 key performance indicators?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text:
Top 5 Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
1 – Revenue per client/member (RPC)
2 – Average Class Attendance (ACA)
3 – Client Retention Rate (CRR)
4 – Profit Margin (PM)
5 – Average Daily Attendance (ADA)

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is KPI measurement tools?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: WHAT ARE KPI TOOLS? KPI tools are a business reporting solution used by companies to track, monitor, and generate actionable insights from key performance indicators specific to the company's business objectives to achieve sustainable business development and, ultimately, profit.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What are the 3 types of KPIs?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text:
Types of KPIs

Quantitative indicators that can be presented with a number. Qualitative indicators that can't be presented as a number. Leading indicators that can predict the outcome of a process.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is a KPI example?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: An example of a key performance indicator is, “targeted new customers per month”. Metrics measure the success of everyday business activities that support your KPIs. While they impact your outcomes, they're not the most critical measures. Some examples include “monthly store visits” or “white paper downloads”.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is KPI vs metrics?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: KPIs measure performance based on key business goals while metrics measure performance or progress for specific business activities. KPIs are strategic while metrics are often operational or tactical.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What is the most important KPI?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text:
Revenue Concentration

The best use of your time, energy, and resources are often the clients, customers, and projects that drive the most revenue for your business. That's why revenue concentration is another must-track financial KPI for your business.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What are KPIs called now?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: OKRs, which stands for Objectives and Key Results, provide that much needed direction and context. We like to call them “KPIs with soul.” The Objective describes what you want to accomplish and the Key Results describe how you know you're making progress.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: What makes a strong KPI?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: A KPI should be simple, straightforward and easy to measure. Business analytics expert Jay Liebowitz says that an effective KPI is one that “prompts decisions, not additional questions.” For example, “How many customers did we add this quarter?” is clear and simple.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey, what's going on?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi Buddy!  What is new?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I can't wait to tell you my news!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: You won't believe what I got myself into!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Tell me, please, you sound excited.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Well, maybe you will believe me

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Only one way to find out, what's up?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I just enrolled in a basic photography course.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I lasts for about 21 days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's pretty cool, you've always loved taking pictures.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I will be taking tons of pictures, but hopefully better ones.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm in another country at the moment, she could use a good photographer.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: No more filling up your phone with plain old pictures.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What country are you in?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm actually in Egypt at the moment, taking part in a conference.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Let me guess?  Russia?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Oh wow.  Always wanted to see the pyramids.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: No, too far north. The Russians here though, it's international.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Luckily you can see a lot of them up close and personal and new youtube videos these days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can see the pyramids, they are pretty amazing.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It's nothing like what you see in videos.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I hear the camel ride people are very annoying.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: They want to overcharge you as much as they can.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Haven't tried the camel rides, don't have a lot of time. Just five days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Ok.. have fun.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi there.  It's only been 37 minutes, but I have so much news to tell you!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Now I'm bored, just washing clothes.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Tell me your news.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I will cure your boredom with details of my life events.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I did some laundry!  yay!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It can't be worse than hearing about the winter storm.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That included folding and putting the clothes away.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I also played fetch with my cat.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: His paw-eye coordination is out of this world.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Stay warm, I've heard it's getting down to 45°C in places.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Cats don't like the cold.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: 45 C sounds quite warm actually.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Are you sure you don't mean 45 F

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: - 45C, it's all over the news.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That, plus news about Afghanistan.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yikes, that sounds like Antarctica.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I wouldn't mind visiting Antarctica, the cost of living is probably pretty low there.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I have so many future plans as well, such as new photo classes and such.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: You know, if photography doesn't work out you could go to work for a TV production.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Maybe.  I'm going on a short vacation next week. To get recharged.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Anywhere special?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Please tell me it's not to see King Charles Christmas speech.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: To the beach.  Gonna get some Sun.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I doubt he gives that speech in March.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Probably not. I've got to go, I'm at the conference location.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: ok see ya

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi there.. Are you well rested?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Been a while, how's the photography?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yeah, got checked into the hotel.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: No progress on the photos yet.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Not sure what to do this evening.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I did watch some TV dramas though.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I ate a great little cafe on the river.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I did too, that got me thinking about taking my own sabbatical. Like they did on TV.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I put together a desk from Ikea.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Did you take pictures of the furniture?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: IKEA would appreciate that.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: One of the TV shows was of the curse of the mummies of the pyramids.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: You better watch out while you're in Egypt!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Don't get me started talking about the pyramids. It is so hot.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Good idea.  I'll take some pictures.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hot is better than -45 C.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm gonna sit around and do nothing but get ready for next week.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'll definitely take the heat over the frigid temperatures back home.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: FYI, don't buy any weighted blankets from Target.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: They are killing kids, the blankets.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: No chance, I don't think I've seen any stores like that over here. They do sell stuff like that on the street though.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm sure it's not on purpose.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm going to start a business side hussle in about 6 months.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds like a conspiracy. I heard all about conspiracies at the conference during the registration.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'll let you know how it goes.  See you soon!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Okay, take care of yourself.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Good evening!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi friend.  Nice to see you!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can't wait to tell you about what I just started.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Feel free to keep talking.  I can listen and talk at the same time.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What did you start? I just began writing a sci-fi novel

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I just started some new software for my client.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It is for managing finances.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: If all goes smoothly, it should be done in about a half a year.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What kind of software?  maybe I can use to finish my book which will probably take a year

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sci-fi novel sounds interesting.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: You could use the software to manage all the money you make with your new novel.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: you read any sci-fi novels?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Not currently, but I have in the past.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I wish, this is my first book that I'm writing

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: You will be so famous.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: well maybe you can read my book when it's done, hopefully done in a year

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It's so nice to get to know you before you become a famous author.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: If you spend a year on it, I'm sure it will be well done.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'll read your sci-fi novel.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's what I'm hoping for, new York Times best seller. what's your software for?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: the software is for the managing of finances.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It helps with dealing with money.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi again, long time no see.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I hope you would like to hear about what I've been up to.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: good still writing my book but I am taking a cooking class. taking up most of my time

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Either way, I'm still going to tell you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How's the software?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: There hasn't been any significant progress these past five days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I went on a nice hike in the park though.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: why not?  I don't blame you

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: nice which park did you hike ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I also went to a museum about natural history.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I forget the name of the park, but it was within 10 miles from here.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: how did you like that?  I'm doing some research on sub genres on sci-fi so I can include it in my book

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I also went to Yellowstone to the west of here, but I didn't hike.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I rode a bike at that natural attraction.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Never been there. but did you here short sellers made $15 billion betting against Tesla?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Your an avid bike rider?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I heard that.  Amazing.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I have rode on my bikes all my life.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It's a great way to stay in shape.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I don't ride bikes at all, I like to sit and writ, hence me writing a book

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Lots of people have lost power due to freezing temperatures before the holidays.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi there, still no progress on the software program :(

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: haven't talk to you in 5 days, how's the software?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: However, I did do a few life events.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I took an art class for painting.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I went to the zoo.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I saw a lot of big animals.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Also went to the beach.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It was so refreshing to relax in the Sun.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: great, how did that go? the beach?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I feel like I know what to say before you ask about it.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm planning to take a certification course soon to advance my career just in case this book does not pan out

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Kind of like a sci-fi novel.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Great idea!  Advancing your career is wise.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: thanks, back up plan!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: In the future, I need to identify my project goals and objectives.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That will help a lot.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How do you plan on doing that?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Do you have a title for your novel yet?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: One thing in order to do that is to gather requirements from the stakeholders.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: not yet!  haven't thought about that

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: got any ideas?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hello there! It's great to meet you, I'm looking forward to working together to prepare for the marathon. What do you think our first steps should be?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I think the first step should be to come up with a goal. We should decide on a goal time that we want to achieve and a timeline for when we want to achieve it. Then, we can map out a training plan to help us get there. What do you think?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, setting a goal and timeline is a great idea. We should also do some research to learn about the best training methods and what to expect during the marathon. That way, we can make sure that our training plan is well-structured and effective.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds great! I think our first step should be to look up some training plans to get an idea of what we should be aiming for. We can also read up on some tips and advice from experienced runners to make sure we are prepared for the marathon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Sounds like a great plan! We can also look into finding a running group in our area that could help motivate us and provide support throughout the training process.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's a great idea! Do you know of any running groups in our area? If not, we could look online to see if any are nearby.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Great idea! I think it would be really helpful to join a running group for a few reasons. Not only would we be able to get advice and support from more experienced runners, but also it would give us an opportunity to meet other people who are also preparing for the marathon. Let's look online and see if we can find any running groups in our area.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds like a good plan! I'll start looking online and let you know what I find.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Great! I'll start researching what kind of training plan we should have in place. Do you have any ideas on what kind of training plan we should aim for?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sure! I think it would be best to start by focusing on building a strong base of endurance and strength through steady running and cross-training. We should also make sure to factor in rest and recovery days to give our bodies time to recover. What do you think?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Sounds great! I think it's important to have a plan for our training that is tailored to our individual needs and goals for the marathon. We should also make sure to track our progress so we can measure our progress and adjust our plan if needed. What do you think of that idea?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I think that is a great idea. Having a plan tailored to our individual needs and goals will help us stay focused and motivated. Tracking our progress is also important as it will give us an idea of where we are and what we need to adjust in order to reach our goals.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds great! It's definitely important to stay motivated and track our progress over the year. Do you have any tips on how to do that?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sure! I think one of the best ways to stay motivated and track progress is by setting specific goals for yourself each term and breaking them down into smaller, achievable goals. This way, you can track your progress more easily and have something to aim for. Additionally, it helps to have someone to hold you accountable, like a study partner or mentor, to help you stay on track.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's a great idea! I think setting goals and having someone to help me stay accountable is key to making sure I make the most of this program. Do you have any tips on finding a good study partner or mentor?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi there! I'm glad to hear you're excited about the program. I think finding a mentor or study partner is a great idea. I would start by asking around the program to see if anyone is looking for a study partner. You could also reach out to faculty or staff to see if they have any recommendations. Finally, you could post in online forums to see if anyone is interested in studying with you. Good luck!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's great advice, thank you so much! I'll definitely try all those things. Do you have any advice for balancing classes and other commitments?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely! I think the most important thing is to manage your time wisely. Make a schedule and set aside specific times for studying and completing your assignments. Also, don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it! Lastly, try not to overcommit yourself and make sure to take time for yourself to relax and recharge.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's great advice! I'm definitely going to focus on managing my time and taking breaks when I need them. How do you like the MBA program so far?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2

sessions.text: I'm planning to commit to some volunteer work within the next year but I know I need to set realistic goals.  What do you think once a month good enough?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I think once a month is definitely a good start

sessions.text: I’m planning on starting a workout routine in the next month. Not anything too crazy but just getting a little more active

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I think it is such a small amount of time to give but I need to be realistic.  Setting up a workout routine is best kept if you have a partner

sessions.speaker: speaker_2

sessions.speaker: speaker_2

sessions.speaker: speaker_1

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Ah. So you’re documented then

sessions.text: Getting the ball rolling is easy for me but keeping it rolling is the challenge I find.  Yep all the places to volunteer track their volunteers for one reason or another

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Kind of like people with New Year’s resolutions

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I believe in you

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Right!

sessions.text: Hello friend. What’s new?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi , How's your day been so far?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It’s been hectic

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I just started a social media marketing campaign for my company

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Its been a busy day then , I guess

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Campaign should take around 3 months

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How has your day been

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Awesome. I been busy too. Planning on getting married in 5 months.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow that’s awesome. Marriage is a great thing

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How long have you been dating again?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Not bad actually. Had an easy day at work.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That’s nice to hear

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I been dating for almost four years.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I knew it had been awhile. Is your partner excited for the wedding?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes . he is. Are you married ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I’m not. Maybe one day

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Have to find the right person

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sure. How's your campaign going ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Just starting for now. I hope it goes well though. I’m going to put a lot of work in it

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Have you thought of a theme for your campaign ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It’ll probably be based around Unity. Working together, etc

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hello friend. Long time no talk

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What’s been new?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes . Its been a while. I been busy because I adopted a child. How have you been ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: What! I adopted a child too

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I also graduated from university

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: And finished the campaign

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Wow. what a coincidence. Is it a girl or a boy?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It’s a girl. 5 years old

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: How about yours?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Nice. Its boy four years old. What did you major in university ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Adoption has changed my life though. I love taking care of her

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Business degree

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Great. I have the same feeling. Are you looking for a job now ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I’m at the same job as before, but eventually I would like to be a manager

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Manager or a lawyer

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I’m preparing to take a bar exam next year

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Ah. that's good. Being a manager also comes with responsibilities right ?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi! How's it going?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! It's going well, thanks. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not too bad. Just been really busy lately.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, what have you been up to?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Well, I've been preparing for an international conference I'll be attending in a different country.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Really? That sounds exciting! When is it?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's in about 5 days. So, I've been busy making travel arrangements and preparing my presentation.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great! Is it a conference related to your work?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, it is. It's focused on the latest developments in my field. I'm really looking forward to it.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can imagine! It must be a great opportunity to learn and network with professionals from all over the world.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely! I'm hoping to gain some valuable insights and maybe even collaborate with some experts in the field.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's fantastic! I wish you all the best for the conference. And what about you? What have you been busy with?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Well, I just started moving to a new apartment.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, moving can be quite hectic. How's it going so far?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's been taking up a lot of my time. I've been packing, arranging for movers, and setting up utilities in the new place.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I understand. Moving can be quite a process. How long do you think it will take?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's supposed to take around 5 days. So, hopefully, I'll be all settled in by then.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great! I hope the move goes smoothly for you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you! I'm excited to start fresh in the new apartment.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm sure it will be amazing. New beginnings are always refreshing.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, they are. I can't wait to make new memories in my new place.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Well, I hope everything goes well for both the conference and your move. Good luck!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you! I appreciate it. And good luck to you too with everything you have going on.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi again! How's everything going?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! Things have been quite busy, but overall, going well. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not much has changed for me. I've been focusing on preparing for the conference.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's understandable. It sounds like a big event. Any new updates on that?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not yet. I'm still fine-tuning my presentation and making sure all my travel arrangements are in place.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Great! I'm sure you'll do an excellent job. By the way, I had some interesting conversations with a friend earlier.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Oh really? about what?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: We were discussing current world events and came across some intriguing news. Did you hear about Zelensky's Christmas message to Ukraine?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: No, I haven't. What did he say?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: He described a 'Loss of Hope' in his message. It's quite sobering to hear, especially considering the challenges Ukraine has been facing.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds really intense. I hope things improve for them soon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely. It's disheartening to see people losing hope, especially during the holiday season. On a lighter note, have you caught up with any entertainment news?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not really. What's going on?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Aubrey Plaza and Michael B. Jordan are set to host 'Saturday Night Live'. It should be a fun episode to watch.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's interesting. I'll definitely try to catch it. Speaking of catching up, I've been trying to catch up on some much-needed rest.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, I understand. It's essential to prioritize self-care, especially during busy times like these.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Definitely. I managed to take a short nap earlier, and it made a world of difference.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great to hear. Sometimes, a little rest can do wonders for our productivity. On my end, I've been organizing my schedule and to-do list. It helps keep things on track.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's a good idea. I should probably do some organizing myself. I'll start with my closet, I think.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That sounds like a productive plan. I've been organizing my digital files and folders. It's quite therapeutic to declutter in the virtual space.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I agree. It's amazing how organizing our surroundings, whether physical or digital, can bring a sense of clarity.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely. It helps create a more efficient and peaceful environment, both in our physical and digital lives.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Definitely. Well, I better get back to my preparations for the conference. Thanks for chatting, and I'll catch up with you soon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: No problem at all. Good luck with everything, and feel free to reach out if you need any support. Take care, and talk to you soon!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey there! It's been a while since we last spoke. How have things been?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hi! Yeah, it feels like it's been a bit. Things have been alright, just a bit busy. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Still quite busy with the conference preparations, but nothing major to report. Any updates on your end?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Not much progress here either. I've been trying to stay on top of things, but it's been a bit of a slow week. On a different note, I watched a TV drama episode earlier. It was quite intriguing.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Sounds like a relaxing way to take a break. I did something similar and watched an episode of a TV drama too. Sometimes it's nice to unwind and get lost in a different world for a bit.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely! It can be a great way to recharge. I also watched an interesting YouTube video earlier. It was about a new technology in the market.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds fascinating. What was it about?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It was about HTC's announcement of their Standalone VR Headset. Virtual reality is advancing so quickly. It's incredible to think about the possibilities.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It sure is. The advancements in technology never cease to amaze me. Speaking of news, did you come across any interesting world events lately?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I did. Bethlehem rebounding from the pandemic and lifting Christmas spirits caught my attention. It's wonderful to see communities coming together despite challenges.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's heartwarming. The holiday season brings a sense of joy and unity. On a different note, I read about the UK royal family attending a Christmas day service. It must have been quite a significant event for them.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely. The royal family's presence at such events holds significance for many people. In other news, there's been talk of a possible attack in Islamabad. It's concerning, given the security fears.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's troubling. I hope that the situation can be resolved peacefully and that everyone stays safe. On a lighter note, have you made any progress with your meditation practice?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I have been trying to make it a regular habit. It helps bring a sense of calm amidst the chaos. How about you? Have you had a chance to incorporate any mindfulness into your routine?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not as much as I'd like, but I'm slowly working on it. It's challenging to find the time, but I know it's beneficial for my well-being.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It can be challenging indeed, but even a few minutes of mindfulness can make a difference. Just keep at it, and you'll find the rhythm that works for you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you for the encouragement. I'll definitely keep trying. Anyway, I should get back to my preparations. It was great catching up with you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: You're welcome! I'm glad we had this conversation. Good luck with your conference preparations, and feel free to reach out if you need to chat. Take care, and talk to you soon!

sessions.speaker: initial s
sessions.text: sion:

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi! How have you been?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! I've been good, thanks for asking. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm doing well too. Actually, I wanted to tell you about this charity event I'm planning.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, that sounds interesting. What's the event about?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's a charity event to raise funds for underprivileged children. We'll be hosting it for about 3 days.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great! When is the event going to happen?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: We've set the dates for next month. It'll be a big event, so we're working hard to make it a success.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm sure it'll be amazing! Is there anything specific you need help with?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Actually, yes. We're looking for volunteers to assist us during the event. If you know anyone interested, let me know.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sure, I'll spread the word and see if anyone can join as a volunteer. By the way, I have some news too.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Oh, please share. What's going on?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I just started developing a finance management software for a client. It's a big project and likely to take around 6 months to complete.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow, that's quite a lengthy project. What features are you planning to include in the software?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: The software will have budgeting tools, expense tracking, and financial reporting capabilities. It's going to be a comprehensive solution.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Impressive! How did you get this project? It must be a great opportunity for you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, it's indeed a great opportunity. The client contacted me after seeing my previous work and reached out for this project.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's fantastic! I'm glad things are going well for you. Do you need any assistance with the software development?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you! I might need some help later on with testing and feedback. Once I have a beta version, I'll share it with you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Count me in. I'll be glad to help in any way I can. Anyway, back to the charity event, do you have any ideas for fundraising activities?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can brainstorm some ideas and share them with you. We could have auctions, raffles, and maybe even a mini-concert.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Those sound like great ideas! Let's discuss them further and finalize the plans in our next conversation.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it. Let's stay updated on our respective projects and catch up soon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Definitely! Take care and talk to you soon. Good luck with the software development!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thanks! Take care too and best of luck with the charity event.

sessions.text: later]

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey there! How's everything going?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey! Not much progress on my end. I've been busy doing some household chores and solving a crossword puzzle during the break.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds like a productive break. Well, on my side, I watched an episode of a TV drama series and took care of some laundry.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Nice, it's good to have some downtime. By the way, have you heard about the recent world events?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I've been keeping up with the news. I read about the huge avalanche that happened in Austria. It's quite devastating.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely, it's sad to see natural disasters causing so much destruction. And I heard about the fatal winter storm leaving millions without power in North America. The temperatures are unimaginably low.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, it's a challenging situation for those affected. On another note, did you see the news about HTC announcing its standalone VR headset?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Oh, I missed that! VR technology is advancing rapidly. It's amazing to see the innovation happening in that field. On a different topic, Pope Francis leading a funeral for his predecessor, Benedict XVI, was a historic moment.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, it definitely was a unique and significant event. It's interesting to witness different traditions and changes within the Catholic Church.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely, the world is always evolving. Anyway, getting back to our charity event, did you manage to find any potential volunteers?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I spoke to a few people and shared the details of the event. They seemed interested and promised to get back to me soon.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's great to hear. It's essential to have a dedicated team for the event's success. Meanwhile, I'll keep working on spreading the word and making preparations.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Perfect, teamwork will make this event shine! Also, as for the software development project, I haven't made significant progress yet. Still in the planning stages.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: No worries, projects like these take time. Take your time to plan and outline the software's functionality. When you're ready, I'll be here to assist with testing and feedback.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you for understanding. I appreciate your support and willingness to help. Together, we'll make this software a success too.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely! Our collaboration will bring great results. Let's continue coordinating efforts and keeping each other updated.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely! We've got this. I'm excited for what lies ahead. Talk to you soon!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Take care and talk to you soon. Goodbye for now!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: You too! Goodbye for now.

sessions.speaker: initial s
sessions.text: sion:

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi! It's been a while. How have you been?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! I've been good, thanks for asking. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm doing well too. So much has happened since we last spoke. Where should I start?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely! Fill me in on everything you've been up to.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Well, I completed the landscaping project I mentioned last time. It took quite some time, but now my home looks beautiful with a revamped garden.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's fantastic! It must be satisfying to see the transformation. Did you have any help with the project?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Yes, I hired a professional landscaper to assist me. They did an excellent job, and I'm really pleased with the outcome.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great. Your hard work and the landscaper's expertise paid off. On my end, I've been focused on creating a new business plan for my company.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds exciting! Have you made any significant changes or additions to the business plan?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I've incorporated fresh strategies and ideas to further expand our services. We're aiming for growth and exploring new market opportunities.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Excellent! It's wonderful to see your dedication to the company's growth. Speaking of growth, I also started preparing and executing a social media marketing campaign for my company.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's fantastic news! Social media campaigns can make a huge impact on brand visibility and customer engagement. How long do you think this campaign will run?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: We're planning for the campaign to run for about 3 months. It will involve creating engaging content, targeting specific audiences, and measuring the campaign's effectiveness.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That sounds like a comprehensive approach. I'm sure your expertise in social media marketing will lead to great results. By the way, I've been working on creating a new website for my company.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's wonderful! A well-designed website can attract potential customers and showcase your company's offerings. Do you have any estimated launch date for the website?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: We're aiming to launch the website within the next couple of weeks. I'm working closely with a web development team to ensure all the features and functionalities are implemented smoothly.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's impressive. I can't wait to see the final outcome and explore your company's new online presence. On a different note, have you heard about the recent world events?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, I've been keeping up with the news. I read about China's COVID-19 surge raising the odds of a potential new coronavirus mutant. It's concerning to see the impact of the virus persisting.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely, the fight against the pandemic is an ongoing challenge. On another topic, I came across an interesting news article stating that surging electricity prices make some gas vehicles cheaper than electric ones in Europe.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, that's quite surprising. It's intriguing to see how various factors can influence the cost and viability of different types of vehicles.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Definitely, it highlights the complex dynamics of the automotive industry and the need to consider multiple factors while making decisions. By the way, did you see the news about oil surpassing natural gas as the main fuel for power plants in New England?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: No, I missed that news. It's interesting to see shifts in the energy sector and how different regions adapt based on availability and cost factors.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Absolutely, energy sources play a significant role in shaping economic decisions and environmental considerations. On a different topic, I came across headlines about the lack of a Santa Claus rally in the stock market. It has been quite a challenging year for stocks.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, 2022 has been a challenging year for many sectors. Economic fluctuations and global events tend to impact the performance of the stock market. Let's hope for a better year ahead.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Definitely, let's remain hopeful. On a lighter note, I also went ahead with a community service project during the break. It was heartwarming to contribute to the local community.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's wonderful! Community service projects create a positive impact and foster a sense of belonging. It shows your dedication to making a difference.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you! It was a fulfilling experience, and I'm already brainstorming ideas for future community initiatives. Anyway, let's catch up on our respective projects. Any new updates on your end?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Unfortunately, I haven't made significant progress on my projects. There have been a few unexpected challenges and delays. However, I'm determined to overcome them and push forward.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's alright, sometimes unexpected hurdles arise, but your determination will guide you through. If you ever need assistance or someone to bounce ideas off, don't hesitate to reach out.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you for your support and kind offer. Likewise, if you need any help with your social media marketing campaign or any other aspect of your projects, know that I'm here to assist.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I appreciate that. Our mutual support and collaboration will lead us to great achievements. Let's keep the communication open and continue our progress.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely! Together, we can conquer challenges and accomplish remarkable things. Looking forward to our next conversation. Take care!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: You too! Take care and stay inspired. Goodbye for now!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Goodbye for now. Talk to you soon!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hi, how's it going?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! Pretty good, just keeping busy. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Same here, just started a new MBA program at the university.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, that's exciting! How long is the program?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's about a year, so I have a lot of work ahead of me.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can imagine. Good luck with that! By the way, I just started moving to a new apartment.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Nice! How long will it take for you to settle in?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: About 5 days. It's a bit hectic right now, but I think it'll be worth it.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I understand how stressful moving can be. I hope you enjoy your new place.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you! I'm looking forward to getting everything organized. So, how are you finding the MBA program so far?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: It's challenging but interesting. I'm already learning a lot.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great! I'm sure it will be worth all the hard work in the end.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I hope so. Are you excited about your new apartment?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely! It's a bigger space and in a better location. Can't wait to make it feel like home.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Sounds amazing. I'm happy for you. Do you need any help with the moving process?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you for offering, but I think I have it under control. I appreciate the thought though.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: No problem at all. Just let me know if you change your mind. So, how's the neighborhood around your new apartment?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: It's really nice. Close to cafes, parks, and shops. I think I'm going to enjoy living here.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's wonderful. I'm glad you found a great place to live. Anything else you've been up to lately?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Not much. Just trying to settle into my new job while juggling the move. It's been a busy time.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I can imagine. Moving and starting a new job can both be quite demanding. Hang in there, it'll get easier.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thanks for the encouragement. How about you? Any other exciting things happening besides the MBA program?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Not really, the program is pretty much taking up all my time right now. But I'm looking forward to the learning opportunities.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's understandable. It's good to focus on one thing at a time. Well, if there's anything I can do to help, let me know.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thanks, I appreciate it. Likewise, if you need anything, don't hesitate to reach out. Good luck with the move and settling in!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thanks! I'll definitely keep that in mind. Take care and enjoy your MBA journey!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Will do. Thanks again. Take care as well and enjoy your new apartment. Chat with you soon!

sessions.text: n:

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey, long time no talk! How have you been?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! I've been good, thanks. How about you? It's been a while.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I've been keeping busy. A lot has happened since we last spoke. Firstly, I finished building the swimming pool in my house. It took longer than expected, but it's finally done.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great to hear! I'm sure it's a fantastic addition to your house. On my end, I just finished writing the business plan I mentioned last time. It took a lot of effort, but I'm pleased with the outcome.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Congratulations on completing your business plan! That's a significant achievement. Any exciting developments with it?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you! Well, after completing the business plan, I pitched it to some investors and managed to secure funding for my venture. So, things are looking promising.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's fantastic news! I'm thrilled for you. It must be gratifying to see your hard work paying off. By the way, I have some big news too. I recently adopted a child.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Wow, that's incredible! Congratulations on becoming a parent. How has the experience been so far?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you! It has been a whirlwind, to say the least. Adjusting to parenthood has its challenges, but it's also incredibly rewarding. My child has brought so much joy into my life.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I can only imagine. Parenthood is a life-changing experience. I'm really happy for you. On another note, I finally graduated from the graduate school at the university. It feels like a weight off my shoulders.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Congratulations on your graduation! It's a significant accomplishment. How do you feel now that you've completed your studies?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you! It's definitely a mix of emotions. I'm excited about the opportunities ahead but also a bit nervous. It's a new chapter in my life.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I completely understand. Transitioning into the next phase can be both exciting and daunting. Just know that you've equipped yourself with valuable knowledge and skills.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Your words mean a lot. Thank you for the support. So, besides the swimming pool and adopting a child, what else have you been up to these past months?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Well, it hasn't all been smooth sailing. Unfortunately, I went through a divorce. It's been tough, but I'm taking it one day at a time.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: I'm really sorry to hear that. Divorce can be a challenging experience. If you ever need someone to talk to, know that I'm here for you.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I appreciate your kind words. It means a lot to me. On a more positive note, I also had another baby recently. It's been a rollercoaster of emotions, but I wouldn't trade it for anything.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Congratulations on the new addition to your family! That's such wonderful news. I'm sure your children bring so much happiness into your life.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: They absolutely do. They're my world. Anyway, enough about me. Have you been following any interesting world events lately?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Well, there have been a few notable events. Argentina won the championship in the World Cup, which was quite a celebration for football fans. On a more serious note, there have been security concerns in Islamabad, with warnings of possible attacks.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Wow, Argentina winning the World Cup must have been exciting for fans around the world. However, the security concerns in Islamabad sound concerning. I hope everyone stays safe.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely, safety should be a top priority. On another note, there have also been some exciting news in the entertainment world. Aubrey Plaza and Michael B. Jordan are set to host 'Saturday Night Live' soon. It'll be interesting to see their performances.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds like an entertaining episode of 'Saturday Night Live'. I'll definitely have to tune in. It's always great to see talented actors taking on hosting duties.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely, I'm looking forward to it as well. So, any other major life events or progress you've experienced recently?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you for the kind words. I appreciate it. It's important to prioritize both physical and mental well-being. Speaking of progress, have you been working on any personal goals or achievements?

sessions.text: Absolutely! Besides the album and the new venture, I've been dedicating some time to learning Spanish. It's been quite challenging, but I'm determined to become fluent.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1

sessions.text: Hey, it's been quite a while! How have you been?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2

sessions.speaker: speaker_1

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey, how's it going?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Hey! It's going good, thanks. How about you?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I'm doing well too. Just started preparing for a social media marketing campaign for our company. It's going to take around 3 months.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Oh, that sounds interesting. What's the goal of the campaign?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: The main goal is to increase brand awareness and drive more traffic to our website. We want to reach a wider audience and boost our sales.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's great! I'm actually taking an online course in data science right now. It's a 4-month program.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's awesome! Why did you decide to take the course?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Well, with the growing demand for data science skills in the job market, I thought it would be a valuable addition to my skillset. Plus, I've always been interested in data analysis.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's a smart move. I'm sure it will open up many opportunities for you in the future.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Thank you! I hope so too. So, how are you planning to execute the social media marketing campaign?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: We're starting by conducting market research and identifying our target audience. Then we'll create engaging content and schedule posts on various social media platforms. We'll also be running targeted ads.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That sounds like a comprehensive plan. Are you working with a team or doing it solo?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: I have a small team helping me with the campaign. We have a social media manager, a content creator, and a graphic designer. It's important to have a coordinated effort for maximum impact.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely. Collaboration is key for such projects. As for my online course, it covers various aspects of data science like programming, statistics, and machine learning. It's quite extensive.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That sounds like a challenging course, but I'm sure you'll excel at it. Do you have any specific projects to work on during the course?

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Yes, towards the end of the course, we'll be required to complete a data science project. It will involve analyzing a real dataset and applying the concepts we've learned throughout the program.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's fantastic! It's great that you'll get hands-on experience with real-world datasets. I'm sure that will enhance your learning.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely. I'm really looking forward to it. So, how do you plan to measure the success of your social media marketing campaign?

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: We'll track various metrics like website traffic, engagement rates, and conversion rates. It's important to constantly analyze the data and make adjustments to optimize the campaign's performance.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: That's a data-driven approach, which is perfect considering your role in marketing. Speaking of data, my course also emphasizes the importance of data analysis and deriving insights from it.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: That's great to hear. Data-driven decision-making is crucial in today's business landscape. It seems like our endeavors are somewhat related!

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Absolutely! It's interesting how different disciplines intersect and complement each other. It looks like we both have busy months ahead of us.

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Indeed! But I'm sure the hard work will pay off. We'll both gain valuable skills and contribute to our respective fields.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Definitely. Let's stay motivated and support each other throughout our journeys. Good luck with your social media campaign!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Thank you, and good luck with your online course too! Let's catch up again soon and share our progress.

sessions.speaker: speaker_2
sessions.text: Sounds like a plan. Take care and talk to you soon!

sessions.speaker: speaker_1
sessions.text: Hey, it's been a while! How have you been?
